text: Auto Crossover is a feature in ZOLL Billing that allows you to set a claim to Auto Crossover. When ZOLL Billing sends claims to the clearinghouse during its nightly submission, it gathers all the claims that are ready to go and puts them in a group or batch.

text.text: launch me to auto crossover page
How do I initiate the process of setting a claim status to autocrossover?

text: To set a claim status to autocrossover, you need to apply a payment to the claim. You can do this by clicking the add a transaction link on the payments screen. You can then enter the transaction information and pull up the claim you're working on. You can then set the claim information forwarded to field where you select the appropriate crossover payer.

text.text: What confirmation will Zoll Billing provide after posting the transaction?

text: Zoll Billing will provide a confirmation after posting the transaction.

text.text: Where can I check the status of the claim after setting it to autocrossover?

text: You can search on the claim number and look at the view claim page. You can see that you've successfully submitted for auto crossover, that the claim has completed process with Novitas solutions and is currently in process with Cigna.
